description: This file defines classes and enums for project configuration, including project types, build commands, environment settings, and template initialization info, used for setting up and managing project templates.

classes.name: ProjectType
classes.description: Enumeration of supported project types, including frontend, backend, and database types.

classes.name: ProjectConfig
classes.description: Configuration data for initializing a project, including name, version, description, author, type, output path, and parameters.

classes.name: BuildCommand
classes.description: Configuration for build commands and working directory.

classes.name: InstallDependenciesCommand
classes.description: Configuration for dependency installation commands and working directory.

classes.name: EnvironmentConfig
classes.description: Configuration for environment setup, including versions of tools and SDKs.

classes.name: ConfigureEnvironment
classes.description: Configuration for environment setup commands and working directory.

classes.name: RunTool
classes.description: Configuration for running tools and commands.

classes.name: TestTool
classes.description: Configuration for testing tools and commands.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Aggregated information for initializing a project template, including commands, environment, files, and scripts.

classes.name: TemplateConfigProvider
classes.description: Class to load and parse template configuration from a YAML file, applying project parameter replacements.
